DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics inhale AZD9164 follow administration multiple ascend dos healthy male female subject COPD patient .
DOC.brief_title: A Multiple Ascending Dose Study With AZD9164 Given 13 Days Healthy Male Female Subjects Patients With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
